/.content:
The Sovereign Network
Home
SocietyTeamRoadmapDocumentation
Waitlist Sign-up

An Internet that pays you
to use it

Join the revolution. Build the mesh. Get rewarded. Break free from traditional ISPs and create a decentralized internet where your participation is valued.

Waitlist Sign-up
TBD
Active Nodes
TBD
Rewards Distributed
TBD
Data Routed

A new internet?

Our revolutionary blockchain-powered mesh network transforms how the internet operates, rewarding users for contributing bandwidth, storage, and routing capabilities.

Mesh Network Infrastructure

Connect via Bluetooth Long Range radio to create a decentralized internet backbone that doesn't rely on traditional ISPs.

Distributed Data Storage

Earn rewards by storing encrypted data fragments across the network, creating a resilient and censorship-resistant internet.

Proof of Useful Work

Our consensus engine rewards actual network contributions - bandwidth routing, data storage, and network maintenance.

Automatic Rewards

Get paid in network tokens for every packet routed, every byte stored, and every moment you're connected to the mesh.

Community-Owned ISP

Together we become our own internet service provider, owned and operated by the users who make it possible.

Revenue Distribution

Network profits flow back to participants based on their contributions, creating true digital sovereignty.

Revolutionary Technology Stack

Blockchain Mesh Network

Our proprietary blockchain protocol coordinates a massive mesh network of nodes, each contributing bandwidth and storage capacity. Every transaction, every route, every byte stored is tracked and rewarded through our Proof of Useful Work consensus mechanism.

By utilizing Bluetooth Long Range radio technology, we can create local mesh networks that scale globally, providing internet access even in remote areas while maintaining connection speeds that rival traditional broadband.

Economic Incentive Model

Traditional ISPs extract value from users. We flip the model: users ARE the network, and the network rewards its users. Revenue from network services, transaction fees, and data routing all flow back to the community of node operators.

This creates a sustainable, self-improving network where every participant has a financial incentive to maintain high-quality service, expand coverage, and innovate on the core infrastructure.

Ready to Break Free?

Join thousands of rebels building the future of the internet. Download the node software, connect to the mesh, and start earning rewards today.

Download Node Software
The Sovereign Network

Building the decentralized internet infrastructure that rewards users and creates a society where technology serves humanity's highest potential.

Network
